I've read and enjoyed *cough* rougher forced sex but the context was that the guy doing it was bad and that what he was doing WAS wrong. This makes it seem like "its ok to rape her because she was a widower...oh but she's a virgin? nvm then now its not ok" like its actually...justifying it. that just feels wrong =/

also, she met her husband in a seemingly normal way with a marriage interview. aka, seems like the previous husband didnt buy her, or what would be the point of the interview. But then it also seemed like that company WAS involved? I wish there were more chapters just to explain how this world works 0_o
@slurxzzz and the name of this story would be...? I'm asking for a...friend
